argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lspeqvlco.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P B ) -> M e. LMod ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_pweqi | |- ~P B = ~P ( Base ` M ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( V e. ~P B <-> V e. ~P ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_lincolss | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P ( Base ` M ) ) -> ( M LinCo V ) e. ( LSubSp ` M ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan2b | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P B ) -> ( M LinCo V ) e. ( LSubSp ` M ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_lcoss | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P ( Base ` M ) ) -> V C_ ( M LinCo V ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_sylan2b | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P B ) -> V C_ ( M LinCo V ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` M ) = ( LSubSp ` M ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSpan ` M ) = ( LSpan ` M ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_lspssp | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ ( M LinCo V ) e. ( LSubSp ` M ) /\ V C_ ( M LinCo V ) ) -> ( ( LSpan ` M ) ` V ) C_ ( M LinCo V ) ) |
| 12 | 2, 6, 8, 11 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P B ) -> ( ( LSpan ` M ) ` V ) C_ ( M LinCo V ) ) |
